item.description: Noticed that they are giving away FREE passes for Cloud Expo, NYC. Here’s the link http://bit.ly/jhvU0c
item.why: Date and Time: May 13th, 2011(10 am PT / 1 pm ET) Are the SaaS products enterprise-ready"? The question is no longer "if", but "how." Join-in for this informative online event right from your desktop! Details at: http://bit.ly/jhvU0c

group.name: Boston Cloud Services - All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS, XaaS

item.name: Virtual Session: Building Enterprise-Ready SaaS Products Open for Integration
